愈愈: (いよいよ) - more and more/all the more/increasingly; at last/finally/beyond doubt; (at the) last moment/worst possible time
愉快: (yukai) - agradável, encantador, prazeroso, alegre, contente, divertido, feliz
愉快犯: (ゆかいはん) - criminal who takes delight in people's reaction to his crimes
愉色: (ゆしょく) - cheerful expression; pleased look
愍然: (びんぜん) - pitiable; pitiful; piteous; sorry; sad
意にかなう: (いにかなう) - to satisfy (one); to meet (one's) desire
意に介する: (いにかいする) - (usu. takes the negative form 意に介さない) to mind; to care; to worry
意に叶う: (いにかなう) - to satisfy (one); to meet (one's) desire
意に適う: (いにかなう) - to satisfy (one); to meet (one's) desire
意をくむ: (いをくむ) - to enter into a person's feelings; to guess what somebody feels (using one's intuition)
意を得ない: (いをえない) - beyond one's comprehension; beyond one's grasp
意を得る: (いをえる) - to get (e.g. the gist of something)/to understand; to turn out as one thought
意を汲む: (いをくむ) - to enter into a person's feelings; to guess what somebody feels (using one's intuition)
意を決する: (いをけっする) - to resolve; to ready (oneself)
意を用いる: (いをもちいる) - to pay attention to
意を迎える: (いをむかえる) - to cater to another's wish; to accommodate; to be agreeable
意を酌む: (いをくむ) - to enter into a person's feelings; to guess what somebody feels (using one's intuition)
意中: (いちゅう) - one's mind; one's heart; one's intention
意中の人: (いちゅうのひと) - sweetheart; person in one's thoughts (heart)
意中の女: (いちゅうのおんな) - sweetheart; girlfriend
意余って言葉足らず: (いあまってことばたらず) - unable to find adequate words (e.g. to express feelings); being at a loss for words
意匠惨憺: (いしょうさんたん) - (yoji) taxing one's ingenuity in devising something; agonizing over designing or creating something; making strenuous efforts to devise good ways and means to do something
意匠権: (いしょうけん) - design right; right(s) to a design
意匠登録: (いしょうとうろく) - registration of a design
意向尊重: (いこうそんちょう) - respecting the intentions or wishes of someone
意向形: (いこうけい) - (しよう、だろう etc.) volitional form
意向打診: (いこうだしん) - sounding out the intentions or wishes of someone
意味がある: (いみがある) - to have meaning; to be meaningful
意味がない: (いみがない) - useless; no future in it; doesn't make sense; having no point
意味が無い: (いみがない) - useless; no future in it; doesn't make sense; having no point
意味が通じる: (いみがつうじる) - to be comprehensible
意味が通らない: (いみがとおらない) - incomprehensible; not making sense
意味が通る: (いみがとおる) - (ant: 意味が通らない) to be comprehensible
意味するもの: (いみするもの) - meaning; connotation; denotation
意味の関係理論: (いみのかんけいりろん) - relational theory of meaning
意味をなさない: (いみをなさない) - not making sense; meaningless
意味をなす: (いみをなす) - to make sense; to be meaningful
意味を取る: (いみをとる) - to follow the sense; to understand the meaning of
意味を捉える: (いみをとらえる) - to grasp the meaning
意味ネットワーク: (いみネットワーク) - semantic network (AI)
意味上の主語: (いみじょうのしゅご) - sense subject
意味上の目的語: (いみじょうのもくてきご) - sense object
意味不明: (いみふめい) - of uncertain meaning; ambiguous; cryptic
意味付ける: (いみづける) - to give meaning to
意味内容: (いみないよう) - semantic content (of a term); meaning (of a sentence)
意味合: (いみあい) - implication; nuance; shade of meaning; connotation
意味合い: (いみあい) - implication; nuance; shade of meaning; connotation
意味情報: (いみじょうほう) - semantic information; meaningful information
意味慎重: (いみしんちょう) - (yoji) with profound (often hidden) meaning; being suggestive; pregnant with significance
意味段落: (いみだんらく) - logical paragraph (as opposed to a formal paragraph); segment of text expressing a single meaning
意味深: (いみぶか) - with profound (often hidden) meaning; being suggestive; pregnant with significance
意味深重: (いみしんちょう) - (yoji) with profound (often hidden) meaning; being suggestive; pregnant with significance
意味深長: (いみしんちょう) - (yoji) with profound (often hidden) meaning; being suggestive; pregnant with significance
意味論: (いみろん) - semantics; the study of meaning
意固地: (いこじ) - obstinate; stubborn; obdurate; headstrong; willful; perverse
意地: (いじ) - disposition; spirit; willpower; obstinacy; backbone; appetite
意地が悪い: (いじがわるい) - malicious; deliberately mean
意地でも: (いじでも) - at any cost; at any price; at any expense
意地を張る: (いじをはる) - to not give in; to be obstinate; to be stubborn; to be perverse
意地張る: (いじはる) - to be stubborn; to be obstinate; to be perverse; to not give in
意地悪い: (いじわるい) - ill-natured; mean; nasty; sadistic; cruel; mean-spirited
意外性: (いがいせい) - unpredictability; element of surprise
